scene_description_enriched: Within a circular frame adorned with floral motifs, a bearded man, possibly a prophet or a saint, is depicted. He wears a red hooded robe over a dark garment and holds a scroll inscribed with illegible text. The background is a speckled blue, suggesting a celestial or ethereal setting, with hints of green foliage at the bottom. The overall impression is one of contemplation and divine inspiration.
